secret_rule: Only items that are named after a person or place can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Antonia's Pasta Salad" and "Parisian Baguette".
Can I bring "Boston Cream Pie"?
Yes, you can bring Boston Cream Pie.
Player: Can I bring "London Fog Tea"?
Yes, you can bring London Fog Tea.
Player: Can I bring "Berlin Beer"?
Yes, you can bring Berlin Beer.
Player: Can I bring "Tokyo Sushi"?
Yes, you can bring Tokyo Sushi.
Player: Can I bring "Sydney Steak"?
Yes, you can bring Sydney Steak.
Player: Can I bring "Moscow Mule"?
Yes, you can bring Moscow Mule.
Player: Can I bring "New York Pizza"?
Yes, you can bring New York Pizza.
Player: Can I bring "Dublin Guinness"?
Yes, you can bring Dublin Guinness.
Player: Can I bring "Beijing Duck"?
Yes, you can bring Beijing Duck.
The rule is that the item you bring must be a food or drink that is traditionally associated with a city, and the name must start with the same letter as the city.
Incorrect. Please try again.
